for epoch in range(300):#300   
    loss = 0 # loss  
    for i in range(len(X)):#   Wi
        loss += np.log(1+np.exp(-y[i] * w.dot(X[i])))

        #w += grad -   =
    loss /= len(X) #  loss   
    q.append(epoch) # -  
    loss_list.append(loss) #   Loss
plt.plot(q,loss_list) #  x - q -  , y -  lossa
plt.show()
